summary:
Ginny: Malfoy isn't playing for Slytherin on Saturday, ha!
Harry: Oh, no! What happened to him? Do you know? Is he alright? We...
body:
Ginny: Malfoy isn't playing for Slytherin on Saturday, ha!
Harry: Oh, no! What happened to him? Do you know? Is he alright? We better check on him! I hope he isn't ill!

blog.name: hi-pot-and-news
blog.title: "Wha'cha Writin', Sugar?"
blog.description: Writer; poet; general complainer • She/They (or He; it doesn't bother me) • CAUTION: I post mainly fandom-related things, primarily Harry Potter • My fanfiction | My tip jar • I repost poetry from my Instagram, @purpleprosodies • Commissions for fics and poetry are ever open • I post witch ish on my side-blog: Val The Sigilist

summary: Marcus’ death really gets me, not just cause I like Marcus (I do Hes scenes are always entertaining) but because of what it...
question: Marcus’ death really gets me, not just cause I like Marcus (I do Hes scenes are always entertaining) but because of what it represents. You’ve already stated that Heri relationship with Marcus is representative of her hope of a normal life.  “Will you wait for me...” “Sure” takes a whole new meaning. Because that what she wants, a normal life waiting for her after Voldemort and everything else is done. And he waits. And he does. He dies off after he tries to stay out of the war. (Pt1)
answer:
Babe, you really gonna stand there and make me cry over something I wrote myself? (╥﹏╥)

Yup, in this story, her love for Marcus was the basically the only spark of childhood innocence Heri had. And she took solace when the violence started back up that he was safe in another country. And she managed to cling to that even into her death. But then she meets him in the afterlife… and finds out he’s been dead for a while now.

Gods, I’m a monster.

reblog.comment:
Babe, you really gonna stand there and make me cry over something I wrote myself? (╥﹏╥)

And she managed to cling to that even into her death. But then she meets him in the afterlife… and finds out he’s been dead for a while now.

Gods, I’m a monster.

summary: Silly little idea/AU concept I came up with: legilmency can be blocked by tin foil hats. Somehow. This is not a 'known' fact,...
question: Silly little idea/AU concept I came up with: legilmency can be blocked by tin foil hats. Somehow. This is not a 'known' fact, since the only way it would be found, no one would really want to admit how they discovered it. Imagined a scene with paranoid!Harry lining his hat with tin foil before 1st year. Also occlumency lessons would have gone a bit differently (presuming Harry is wearing a lined hat, at least.)
answer: I feel like this could be canon-compliant or at least a headcanon instead of an AU. It certainly hasn’t been proven in canon that tin foil won’t block Legilimency. Imagine if there was only the slightest point of deviancy, like Harry caught a snippet of a sci-fi film while Dudley was vegging out on the couch. Hell, you know what? Head canon accepted.

reblog.comment: I feel like this could be canon-compliant or at least a headcanon instead of an AU. It certainly hasn’t been proven in canon that tin foil won’t block Legilimency. Imagine if there was only the slightest point of deviancy, like Harry caught a snippet of a sci-fi film while Dudley was vegging out on the couch. Hell, you know what? Head canon accepted.

Imagine if there was only the slightest point of deviancy, like Harry caught a snippet of a sci-fi film while Dudley was vegging out on the couch. Hell, you know what? Head canon accepted.

summary: Song of the day Don’t leave by Ministry of Magic Album: Songs from Gringott’s Vault (2011) This song is maybe a little more on...
caption:
Song of the day

Don’t leave by Ministry of Magic

Album: Songs from Gringott’s Vault (2011)

This song is maybe a little more on the autotuned side than my general musical fare, but I really like Ron/Hermione and this song deals with a really important moment in their relationship and in the trio’s relationships with each other.

Favourite lyrics: And I know it’s been
Such a long time since we’ve just been friends
And not soldiers on the front line of a war
That we were born into

title: Sea Lion's Coffee Shop
description:
by silvergreenroyalty

Harry es dueño de su propio café mágico luego de que fue al mundo muggle y se enamoró del concepto. Tiene un pequeño secreto por el cual, el amor no ha llegado a su vida, pero dos de sus clientes habituales de repente notan a su barista habitual y se preguntan, ¿Por qué demonios no había visto antes a este chico?

**Los personajes son propiedad y autoría de JK Rowling.

blog.name: graceandherbookshelf
blog.title: Grace And Her Bookshelf
blog.description:
@graceandherbookshelf -instagram

Just give me all the books and I'll be happy.

summary:
(Narcissa and Bellatrix in Snape's house)
Bellatrix: I wonder why you haven't killed every Muggle in this village yet...
body:
(Narcissa and Bellatrix in Snape’s house)

Bellatrix: I wonder why you haven’t killed every Muggle in this village yet Snape

Snape: Well that would be foolish of me, people would become suspicious

Snape: and anyway, Brenda next door makes fabulous ginger snap biscuits
